The media server stores information abou: The media server stores information about your media to disk, as well as posters, artwork, and other media resources from the Internet. Running this task deletes any bundles which are no longer in use.

By default the media server doesn't remo: By default the media server doesn't remove information for media right away. This helps if a drive is temporarily disconnected. When you empty the trash for a section, all information about missing media is deleted.

Plex was unable to authenticate your ser: Plex was unable to authenticate your server. Please sign your server out and try again.
Your server was unable to reach Plex. Pl: Your server was unable to reach Plex. Please ensure that the computer or device running your server can access the internet.
You have successfully signed your server: You have successfully signed your server in to Plex, but we were unable to reach it from outside your network.
If you skip this step you will not be ab: If you skip this step you will not be able to share or stream media outside your home. If you change your mind later, you can adjust this in Settings.
If you would like to enable this now, yo: If you would like to enable this now, you will need to configure your router or firewall to allow Plex to contact your server. Please refer to our {1}Connecting a Server{2} article for more information.
Select which additional agents should co: Izberi,katera sredstva bi prispevala metapodatke od {1}, in jih povlecite, da spremenite vrstni red prednosti.
Connecting your server to Plex allows yo: Connecting your server to Plex allows you to stream media outside your home network.
Enable this if automatic mapping fails. You will need to configure your router. Detailed instructions are available {1}here{2}.
Sets the allowed networks setting to 127: Sets the allowed networks setting to 127.0.0.1/255.255.255.255. This requires other computers on a local network to authenticate before accessing the server.
Settings are restricted from shared user: Settings are restricted from shared users.
Help us translate Plex/Web into your lan: Help us translate Plex/Web into your language {1}here{2}.
Automatically play theme music in the ba: Automatically play theme music in the background when available.
Press ? to view the list of {1}available: Pritisnite ? da prikažete seznam {1}bližnjic na voljo{2}.
Dnevnik o razhroščevanju si lahko ogledate {1}tukaj{2}.
Refresh after saving this setting for it: Da bo ta nastavitev začela veljati morate po shranjevanju stran osvežiti.
Drag the items below to reorder your das: Spodnje vnose lahko premikate z vlečenjem in tako preuredite izgled pregledne plošče.
Allow searching libraries that have been: Dovoli iskanje po knjižnicah, ki jih drugi delijo z vami.
Allow searching channels that have enabl: Dovoli iskanje po kanalih, ki to omogočajo.
Use the experimental video player, which: Uporabi Eksperimentalen predvajalnik, ki podpira pretočnost v HTML5 namesto v Flash predvajalnik. Ta funkcija potrebuje nameščen Plex Media Server verzije 0.9.8.6 ali novejše.
Allows the player to play compatible med: Allows the player to play compatible media without any conversion. In most browsers, direct play supports MP4 videos with h264 video and AAC audio. Videos with subtitles cannot be played directly.
Allows the server to copy compatible aud: Allows the server to copy compatible audio and video streams without converting them.
When multiple resolutions are available: Ko je video na voljo v več ločljivostih samodejno izberi najboljšo za največjo kvaliteto ogleda.
Allow Direct Play of AC3 Audio: Allow Direct Play of AC3 Audio
Allow MP4 videos with AC3 audio to be pl: Allow MP4 videos with AC3 audio to be played directly. Browser support for AC3 audio is limited.
Prefer AAC over MP3 when transcoding aud: Ob prekodiranju zvoka raje uporabi AAC kot MP3. Nekatere naprave, naprimer Wii U, podpirajo le HLS z zvokom AAC.
Let's start by giving your Plex Media Se: Začnimo z poljudnim poimenovanjem vašega Plex Media Strežnika, da se bo lahko predstavil drugim računalnikom v omrežju. Če pustite prazno, bo vzeto ime vašega računalnika...
Would you like to help us make Plex bett: Radi bi da nam pomagate izboljšati  Plex za vsakogar? Zbiramo anonimne podatke, ki jih uporabljamo za izboljšanje storitev v daljšem časovnem obdobju.
Plex channels give you access to online: Kanali Plex omogočajo dostop do medijskih vsebin različnih spletnih mest. Brskate lahko po imeniku kanalov in namestite kanale v njem. Začnete lahko tudi z namestitvijo nekaj izpostavljenih kanalov.
See, that wasn't too bad, right? At this: Vidite, to ni bilo tako težko. Plex v tem trenutku neutrudno dela in pripravlja vašo medijsko knjižnico, da bo izgledala prekrasno.
Feel free to watch Plex work, or take th: Lahko uživate ob gledanju kako Plex dela ali pa izkoristite priložnost in si {1}prenesete{2} kakšno Plex aplikacijo!
We really appreciate it. See what {1}ben: To zelo cenimo. Poglejte katere {1}prednosti{2} vam prinese vaša naročnina.
Za deljene strežnike ta nastavitev ni mogoča.
A problem has been detected with a core: Zaznana je težava z osnovno komponento Plex Media Strežnika.
Please visit the {1}forums{2} and provid: Prosim obiščite {1}forume{2} in podajte strežnikove dnevniške zapise kot je opisano {3}tukaj{4}.
Sign in with a Plex account to help your: S prijavo v vaš Plex račun omogočite vašim napravam, da se lažje najdejo med seboj, dostopate do svojih medijev od vsepovsod in od vsepovsod lahko postavite videe v čakalno vrsto, ki si jo lahko ogledate pozneje v Plexu.
Plex organizes your media into libraries: Plex vaše medije razporedi v knjižnice. Knjižnice lahko po želji dodajate in imate tudi več različnih knjižnic z istim tipom datotek.
Prosim počakajte trenutek, ko se Plex zažene.
To save a video to your queue, click “❯: Če želite shraniti video v čakalni vrsti, kliknite na“❯ Plex It!” V vrstici z zaznamki, tako da lahko gledam kasneje.
A panel will appear on the left side of: Plošča se prikaže na levi strani strani,tako,da veste da je bil videoposnetek shranjen
You can also recommend the video to frie: Video lahko tudi priporočite prijateljem ali pa ga shranite v Plex in si ga tam ogledate kasneje.
Send an email to the address above with: Na epoštni naslov naveden zgoraj pošljite povezave do videov, ki jih želite dodati v vašo predvajalno vrsto.
Add this to your address book so you can: Dodajte ta naslov med vaše stike, da boste lahko pošiljali povezave iz vašega iPhona, iPada, Androida ali kake druge naprave.
Plex was unable to authenticate your ser: Plex was unable to authenticate your server. Please sign out and try again.
Plex was unable to connect to your serve: Plex was unable to connect to your server. Please ensure that the computer or device with your server can be reached from outside your home network.
Plex is currently not responding. Please: Plex is currently not responding. Please try again in a few minutes.
Plex was unable to connect to your serve: Plex was unable to connect to your server. Please ensure that the computer or device with your server can access the internet.
You will not be able to stream media fro: Dokler se to ne razreši streamanje medijev izven vašega omrežja ne bo mogoče.
Please refer to the {1}Connecting a Serv: Please refer to the {1}Connecting a Server{2} FAQ for more information.
Connecting your server to Plex allows yo: Connecting your server to Plex allows you to stream media outside your home network, and can help your devices find each other.
Until then, you can use the {1}old web a: Do takrat lahko za dostop do tega področja uporabljate {1}staro spletno stran{2}.
Mind the construction. Parked cars may b: Mind the construction. Parked cars may be towed.
This Plex Media Server doesn't exist.
You need a Plex Media Server for this.
You do not have permission to access thi: You do not have permission to access this Plex Media Server.
Grab a tea, and we will be back online s: Grab a tea, and we will be back online shortly.
Please check your internet connection an: Please check your internet connection and try again.
There was an issue connecting to this Pl: There was an issue connecting to this Plex Media Server.
This name will be used to identify this: To ime bo uporabljeno za opredelitev tega medijskega strežnika na druge računalnike v omrežju. Če pustite prazno, bo vzeto vaše ime računalnika...
Send anonymous usage data to Plex: Pošlji anonimne podatke o uporabi v Plex
This helps us improve your experience (f: To nam pomaga izboljšati vaše izkušnje (na primer, da bi nam pomagali z ujemanjem filmov in televizijskih oddaj).
Enable Plex Media Server verbose logging: Enable Plex Media Server verbose logging
Ask to add a login item for externally m: Vprašaj da dodat prijavo postavke za zunanje nameščene pogone
Enable Plex Media Server debug logging: Omogoči Plex Media Server razhroščevanje prijave
Your library will be updated automatical: Vaša knjižnica se bo samodejno posodobila, ko zazna spremembe v knjižnici mape.
The number of recent weeks used as the w: Št. tednov, ko je lahko vsebina na vrhu
Update my library periodically: Mojo knjižnico posodabljaj v rednih intervalih.
Empty trash automatically after every sc: Samodejno izprazni koš po vsakem pregledovanju
Include music sections in automatic upda: Vključuje glasbene odseke in samodejne posodobitve
Large music sections may take a long tim: Pregledovanje večje količnie glasbe lahko traja veliko časa.
Number of seconds to wait before a plugi: Number of seconds to wait before a plugin times out
Capability checking ensures that plug-in: Sposobnost preverjanje zagotavlja, da so plug-ins, ki so nezdružljive s to različico strežnika ali tekočega odjemalca, ki ga uporabljate skrito. Onemogočanje preverjanja zmogljivosti je uporabno v razvoju, vendar bo omogočilo dostop do vtičnikov, ki lahko nezanesljivo opravljajo določene vloge strank.
List of networks that are allowed withou: Seznam omrežij, iz katerih je dovoljen dostop brez prijave
Comma separated list of ip/netmask for n: Seznam IP-naslova/maske omrežja (elementi ločeni z vejico), iz katerih je dovoljen dostop na strežnik brez prijave.
Timeout in seconds segmented transcodes: Časovni rok v sekundah ločeni transcodes počakajte prekodiranje za začetek pisanja podatkov
Duration in minutes to use when transcod: Trajanje v minutah, ki se uporabljajo pri pretvarjanju nekaj z neznanim trajanjem
Directory to use when transcoding for te: Imenik ki se uporablja  pri pretvarjanju začasne datoteke
Amount in seconds to buffer before throt: Amount in seconds to buffer before throttling the transcoder
Show the WebKit window used by plugins i: Show the WebKit window used by plugins instead of placing it off screen
Enable Media Link down-mixing of DTS aud: Enable Media Link down-mixing of DTS audio.
Media Link does not support DTS audio in: Media Link does not support DTS audio in certain regions. The Plex Media Server can automatically convert DTS to stereo so that it will play.
Offer higher bitrates over 3G connection: Na povezavah 3G ponudi višje bitne hitrosti
Automatically select audio tracks in you: Ko je mogoče, samodejno izberi zvočno sled v zaželenem jeziku.
Client-specific configuration settings f: Client-specific configuration settings for the DLNA server
Protocol info string used in GetProtocol: Protocol info string used in GetProtocolInfo responses by the DLNA server
Number of seconds between DLNA media ren: Number of seconds between DLNA media renderer discovery requests
Enable the PMS DLNA server to report tim: Enable the PMS DLNA server to report timelines for video play activity
Close Modal or Close Player or Navigate: Close Modal or Close Player or Navigate Back
